name: Chapter 12: The Final Code
short_description: In a race against time, Data and the Codarian coders work tirelessly to finalize the re-coding. The crew rallies together, overcoming the final obstacles and aligning all efforts towards a successful implementation.
people: Data, Captain Picard, Codarian coders, Enterprise crew
to_next_chapter: The completed code is ready to be tested against the cosmic event.
